title: Did I kill a thread?
content:
I posted a critique to a thread about a poster on the subject of Frutiger, unfortunately I cannot remember the name of the thread’s originator (although I know they were from Ankara), the only other post was from Prakash Nair, I got the “page not found” page and now I cannot find the thread.  
Anyway, my apologies if I inadvertently killed off your thread, it really wasn’t that bad.  
Tim
author: timd
